com.pump.image.pixel.quantize

Class ColorLUT

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pump.image.pixel.quantize.ColorLUT

  • public class ColorLUT
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a tool to help reduce the time it takes to map an arbitrary color to its closest match(es) in limited color set.

    Internally: this breaks up the 3D color cube into hundreds of smaller subcubes. So instead of searching through all possible colors every time we require a match: we hone in on the exact subcube and iterate outward a cycle or two.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static class  ColorLUT.ColorNode 
      static class  ColorLUT.Match
